item.title: Where's the Fun in AI Gambling?
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we break down the role of AI in the online gambling scene.

item.title: Meet the Guys Betting Big on AI Gambling Agents
item.description: Online gambling is a massive industry. The AI boom keeps booming. It was only a matter of time before people tried to put them together.

item.title: The US Military Is Raking in Millions From On-Base Slot Machines
item.description: The Defense Department operates slot machines on US military bases overseas, raising millions of dollars to fund recreation for troops—and creating risks for soldiers prone to gambling addiction.
